page.title: 04INDUSTRY IN THE LOCAL AREA
page.content: The major employer in the local area is the British Steel Corporation's Ravenscraig plant. stretching over a large area, the Ravenscraig is a fully efficient steel plant. Using coal from Scottish pits and iron or from England, the Ravenscraig produces large quantities of high grade, light_weight steel. There has been a history of steel making in the local area. At the present time, there is a great political debate about th future of Ravenscraig, especially after this week's decision that Gartcosh strip mill is to close. New, smaller industries have been introduced into the local area due to the work done by the Scottish Development Agency who help them by giving them loans and grants etc.
